name: crm-saas-platform
description: Advanced CRM SaaS Platform built with React, Node.js, TypeScript, and modern tech stack

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run build" "cd services/auth-service && npm run build" "cd services/contacts-service && npm run build"
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run test" "cd services/auth-service && npm run test" "cd services/contacts-service && npm run test"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:services
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run lint" "cd services/auth-service && npm run lint" "cd services/contacts-service && npm run lint"
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:services
scripts.type-check:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run type-check" "cd services/auth-service && npm run type-check" "cd services/contacts-service && npm run type-check"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd shared/database && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules services/*/node_modules shared/*/node_modules

author: CRM SaaS Team
